reviewText:
Very sloppy DVD version of a good film. Shame! One hundred dollars for a copy that does not include the full opening
and closing of the movie. What a ripoff. Plus, two discs were not required.

This is an excellent WWII movie.  However, the quality of this Chinese recording is low, as if it were copied from a VHS (probably was).  Also the English subtitles are poor, obviously not copied from the script but transcribed by listening to (and misunderstanding) the actors.  I will keep my VHS copy and wait for a better DVD version.
